original_text: The priest must bring the young bull to the door of the Lord's Tent of Meeting. He must put his hand on the animal's head. And then he must kill it in front of the Lord.
korean_text: 그 수송아지를 회막 문 여호와 앞으로 끌어다가 그 수송아지의 머리에 안수하고 그것을 여호와 앞에서 잡을 것이요

sentences.original_text: The priest must bring the young bull
to the door of the Lord's Tent of Meeting
He must put his hand on the animal's head
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 동물의 머리에 손을 얹어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: And then he must kill it
